titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for raysing and maintaining of horse and foot for the garrison of Glocester : and for the counties of Glocester, Hereford, Monmouth, Glamorgan, Brecknocke and Radnor : and to enable the committee for the said counties and city of Glocester, to put all former ordinances of Parliament for advance of mony [sic] in execution.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
